Jaguar.title: Jaguar
Jaguar.description: The jaguar is a large feline native to Central and South America. It has a robust body, a broad head, and powerful jaws.

Dog.title: Dog
Dog.description: A domesticated carnivore of the family Canidae, commonly known as the dog.

Jaguar.answer: Jaguars are typically found in rainforests, swamps, and wooded regions across Central and South America.
They are ambush predators and have one of the strongest bites relative to body size among big cats.

Dog.answer: Dogs are omnivores, eating a mix of meat and plant-based food depending on breed and training.
